code: import{Card,Stack,Text}from"@chakra-ui/react";import StarIcon from"./icons/Star";import FaqAccordion from"./Accordion";import{colors}from"../themes";import useWindowSize from"../hooks/ScreenSIze";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const FaqCard=()=>{const isMobile=useWindowSize();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{sx:{maxWidth:isMobile?"90%":"650px",marginTop:isMobile?"-30%":"-10%",borderRadius:"16px",boxShadow:"0 4px 8px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2), 0 6px 20px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.19)",px:isMobile?"0.5em ":"2.5em",py:"1.5em"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Stack,{sx:{display:"flex",flexDirection:"row",alignItems:"center"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StarIcon,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{sx:{fontSize:isMobile?"36px":"56px",fontWeight:"700",ml:".5em",color:colors.darkPurple},children:"FAQs"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaqAccordion,{})]});};export default FaqCard;
